body_html:
I don't know of anyone specifically responsible for tf.where.

The fact that we don't use cusparse is an issue. Writing a specialized op for this would probably be a good idea (basically to_sparse(dense) -> tf.SparseTensor via dense2coo).
body_text:
I don't know of anyone specifically responsible for tf.where.
The fact that we don't use cusparse is an issue. Writing a specialized op for this would probably be a good idea (basically to_sparse(dense) -> tf.SparseTensor via dense2coo).
body:
I don't know of anyone specifically responsible for tf.where.

The fact that we don't use cusparse is an issue. Writing a specialized op for this would probably be a good idea (basically to_sparse(dense) -> tf.SparseTensor via dense2coo).
